rows.label: tlk41100124_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't care what my parents say,
I'm going to become a botanical
scientist in Superbia.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You know how Gula has lots of
trees everywhere, right? More than
any other country in Alst, actually!

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It lets us make all kinds of wooden
things, from furniture to tools.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But in Superbia, they hardly have
any trees at all.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Apparently they wouldn't be able to
survive without the wood we export.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0006
rows.name:
As someone who grew up in Gula,
that makes me really sad. I can't
imagine living without trees and wood.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0007
rows.name:
So I want to study botany in
Superbia, and do something
about their tree shortage problem.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0008
rows.name:
My dream is to make Superbia the
second most tree-covered country
in Alst! After Gula, of course!
